title: Pick up on South Street
creator_credit: Edward Hooker, Michael Capon, Great Britain. Post Office. Telecommunications Safety Services Branch and Post Office Telecommunications
brief_description: An instructional film about the correct way to handle heavy goods. “Its just like picking up a girl you have to have the know-how and the right equipment.”
